draggable (directive in module ui.drop )

Description

Simple directive which denotes a 'draggable' widget. Currently, there are no parameters, and it is impossible to configure the directive's behaviour.

Usage

as attribute
<ANY draggable
     [drag-keep-size="{boolean}"]
     [drag-within="{string}"]>
   ...
</ANY>
as class
<ANY class="draggable [drag-keep-size: {boolean};] [drag-within: {string};]">
   ...
</ANY>

Parameters

  • drag-keep-size(optional) – {boolean=} –

    The dragged item should maintain its original size while dragging if set to true. Default: false.

  • drag-within(optional) – {string=} –

    Provides a constraint to limit the area through which an element may be dragged. It may be a tag name, or the special value '^' or 'parent' to refer to the parent element. If jQuery is in use, it may also be a selector supported by jQuery's $.fn.closest.
